entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hendrickson Creek 10:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
